Resume SCM selective forward selection workflow from a saved checkpoint

Source: R/scm-selective-forward.R
resume_selective_forward.Rd

Loads a previously saved search state and continues selective forward selection from where it left off. Can handle incomplete models, update statuses, and determine the appropriate next step (continue forward selection or start redemption phase). Provides flexible resumption options for interrupted workflows.

Usage

resume_selective_forward(
  checkpoint_file,
  forward_p_value = NULL,
  rse_threshold = NULL,
  auto_submit = TRUE,
  auto_retry = TRUE,
  continue_forward = TRUE
)

Arguments

checkpoint_file

Character. Path to the RDS file containing saved search state (e.g., "scm_selective_step_3.rds", "scm_forward_selection_complete.rds")

forward_p_value

Numeric. P-value for forward selection significance testing. If NULL, uses value from search_state$search_config$forward_p_value (default: 0.05)

rse_threshold

Numeric. Maximum acceptable RSE threshold as percentage. If NULL, uses value from search_state$search_config$max_rse_threshold (default: 50)

auto_submit

Logical. Whether to automatically resubmit incomplete models found in the last step (default: TRUE)

auto_retry

Logical. Whether to enable automatic retry creation for failed models during resubmission (default: TRUE)

continue_forward

Logical. Whether to automatically continue forward selection if possible, or just load and prepare the state (default: TRUE)

Value

List containing:

  • search_state - Updated search state with current model statuses

  • status - Resume status: "ready", "ready_to_continue", "forward_complete", "no_completed_models"

  • best_model - Current best model across all completed steps

  • best_model_step - Step number where best model was found

  • best_model_ofv - OFV of the best model

  • last_step - Last step number found in database

  • next_step - Suggested next step number (if continuing)

  • redemption_suggested - Whether redemption phase is recommended

  • message - Descriptive message about resume status

Details

Resume Selective Forward Selection from Checkpoint

This function performs the following operations:

  1. Loads the checkpoint file and validates search state structure

  2. Determines the last completed step and identifies incomplete models

  3. Updates model statuses from NONMEM output files

  4. Optionally resubmits incomplete models if auto_submit=TRUE

  5. Identifies the current best model (lowest OFV) across all steps

  6. Determines appropriate next action:

    • Continue forward selection if significant models exist in last step

    • Suggest redemption phase if best model is from earlier step

    • Mark as complete if no significant improvements possible

  7. Provides recommendations for next steps based on current state

Checkpoint Files

Common checkpoint files created by selective forward selection:

  • scm_selective_step_N.rds - Saved after each completed step

  • scm_selective_complete.rds - Final state after completion

  • scm_redemption_N.rds - Saved during redemption phase

Resume Scenarios

Incomplete Models

If models from the last step are still running or failed, they will be updated and optionally resubmitted

Continue Forward

If significant models exist in last step and best model is from that step, forward selection can continue

Redemption Phase

If best model is from an earlier step, redemption testing of remaining covariates is suggested

Complete

If no significant models exist in last step and best model is from that step, forward selection is complete

See also

run_scm_selective_forward for starting selective forward selection, save_search_state for creating checkpoint files, get_significant_models_from_step for analyzing step results

Examples

if (FALSE) {
# Resume from step 3 checkpoint and continue automatically
result <- resume_selective_forward("scm_selective_step_3.rds")
search_state <- result$search_state

# Resume with custom thresholds, just load state without continuing
result <- resume_selective_forward(
  checkpoint_file = "scm_selective_step_5.rds",
  forward_p_value = 0.01,
  rse_threshold = 40,
  continue_forward = FALSE
)

# Resume and resubmit incomplete models without auto-retry
result <- resume_selective_forward(
  checkpoint_file = "scm_selective_step_2.rds",
  auto_submit = TRUE,
  auto_retry = FALSE
)

# Check what would happen next without actually continuing
status <- resume_selective_forward(
  checkpoint_file = "scm_selective_complete.rds",
  continue_forward = FALSE
)
cat("Status:", status$status)
cat("Best model:", status$best_model)
cat("Redemption suggested:", status$redemption_suggested)
}
